articles.title: Order: "Did they want the good game? Here it is. Did they want goals not with the first shot on goal? Here it is. They will show up again, this is guaranteed. In the meantime, maalox reflux is recommended"
articles.summary: Milan wins in Bologna with a clear and convincing 3-0. Mature match for the team despite the absences in attack and on the wing, with Allegri never giving Italiano a chance to let his team express themselves at speed.

articles.summary: Milan wins 3-0 against Bologna and sends a clear message to its Nerazzurri cousins. Yesterday at the end of the match, Rabiot proudly stated that without the Rossoneri, Inter would win the championship alone.
